article_title: How To Keep It & What Happens If You Lose It

article_metadata.author: Kelly Phillips Erb

og.description: As part of the Affordable Care Act (sometimes called Obamacare), young adults are generally allowed to stay on a parent's health care plan until age 26 so long as the plan offers coverage for dependents. Here's how to stay covered and what happens if you don't.
og.title: Health Insurance After College: How To Keep It & What Happens If You Lose It
